name: Homemade Puff Pastry Recipe with Sausage Rolls
author: farmgirl
summary: Quick puff pastry is the key to making these light and fluffy sausage rolls.
directions: Place 1/4 cup butter in a food processor
Add flour; pulse until butter is completely mixed
Add remaining butter and pulse until pea-sized pieces remain
Add water evenly until a loose, ragged dough forms
Place dough between 2 pieces waxed paper and roll out into a rectangle
Combine pork sausage, 1 egg, bread crumbs, garlic, and onion powder in a bowl
Add filling to the pastry strips; roll pastry closed around the filling
Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Cut rolls into 1-inch pieces and place seam-side down on a baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 15 to 20 minutes
